wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Geers Cotterell, 1st Baronet (21 September 1757 – 26 January 1845) was a British politician. He served as the Conservative Member of Parliament for Herefordshire from 1802 to 1803, and from 1806 to 1831.

response: *Sir John Cotterell, 1st Baronet, MP and landowner
*Sir John Cotterell, 1st Baronet (1757-1845), MP for Herefordshire
